#### curve of under-reporting fraction

$$
\text{underreporting fraction} = \frac{\text{nowcast from case reports}}{\text{nowcast from fatalities}}
$$

```{r}

nowcast_from_cases <- US.all
nowcast_from_deaths <- US.nowcast

underreporting <- nowcast_from_cases$nowcast.mean[1:106] / nowcast_from_deaths$nowcast.mean[1:106]

underreporting.upper <- nowcast_from_cases$nowcast.upper95[1:106] / nowcast_from_deaths$nowcast.upper95[1:106]
underreporting.lower <- nowcast_from_cases$nowcast.lower95[1:106] / nowcast_from_deaths$nowcast.lower95[1:106]


# plot(x = US.all$Date[1:106], y = underreporting, yaxt="n", type= 'l', ylab="Case ascertainment (%)", xlab = "Date")
# lines(x = US.all$Date[1:106], y = underreporting.upper, type= "l", lty = "dashed")
# lines(x = US.all$Date[1:106], underreporting.lower, type= "l", lty = "dashed")
# axis(2, at=pretty(underreporting), lab=pretty(underreporting) * 100, las=1)

plot(x = US.all$Date[1:106], y = underreporting, yaxt="n", type= 'l', log='y', ylab="Case ascertainment (%)", xlab = "Date")
lines(x = US.all$Date[1:106], y = underreporting.upper, type= "l", lty = "dashed")
lines(x = US.all$Date[1:106], underreporting.lower, type= "l", lty = "dashed")
axis(2, at=pretty(underreporting), lab=pretty(underreporting) * 100, las=1)

```
